title: Ticket #853: Configure problem on hpux
description:
When looking at a configure step of Condor in NMI for V7_4-branch for HPUX, I found this: 

configure: verifying build environment
checking for rpm... no
./configure[1723]: ==: A test command parameter is not valid.
checking for sysctl... no
./configure[1896]: ==: A test command parameter is not valid.
configure: determining host platform

I went to the section of code in question, changed the == to =, and fixed up some of the other tests to be more defensive in between those two tests.

It turns out this is in V7_4_0-branch, so I'm fixing it there and merging it up.
check_ins: 2009-Oct-14 14:31   Check-in [16052]: Fixed a configure syntax problem. #853 (By Peter Keller )
creator: psilord
